rate_limit.label: Rate limit
rate_limit.comment: This functionality limits the number of requests a user (identified by IP address) can perform within a specific time frame, preventing excessive resources usage and maintaining system performance, stability and security.

timeframe.label: Timeframe
timeframe.comment: Number of seconds between each allowed request.

flush_cron_expr.label: Cron Expression for Cache Flushing
flush_cron_expr.comment: The default value is "30 2 * * *". An empty value disables automatic cache flushing.

ua_regexp.comment: Match expressions in the same order as displayed in the configuration.

template_ua_regexp.comment: Match expressions in the same order as displayed in the configuration.

pagination_frame.label: Pagination Frame
pagination_frame.comment: How many links to display at once.

pagination_frame_skip.label: Pagination Frame Skip
pagination_frame_skip.comment: If the current frame position does not cover utmost pages, will render link to current position plus/minus this value.

anchor_text_for_previous.label: Anchor Text for Previous
anchor_text_for_previous.comment: Alternative text for previous link in pagination menu. If empty, default arrow image will used.

anchor_text_for_next.label: Anchor Text for Next
anchor_text_for_next.comment: Alternative text for next link in pagination menu. If empty, default arrow image will used.

logo.label: Logo Image
logo.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png. To make logo look good on high-resolution displays, upload an image that is 2x normal size and then specify 1x dimensions in width/height fields below.

logo_width.label: Logo Width
logo_width.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

logo_height.label: Logo Height
logo_height.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

css_non_inline.label: Non-inline CSS File(s)
css_non_inline.comment: Comma-delimited list of files that will be included inside <style> tag for all templates that include use the '{{var non_inline_styles}}' variable. File path is relative to skin/frontend/PACKAGE/THEME/css/

allow_ips.label: Allowed IPs (comma separated)
allow_ips.comment: Leave empty for access from any location.

allow_symlink.label: Allow Symlinks
allow_symlink.comment: Warning! Enabling this feature is not recommended on production environments because it represents a potential security risk.

active_admin.label: Enabled for Admin
active_admin.comment: Translate, blocks and other output caches should be disabled for both frontend and admin inline translations.

min_level.label: Minimum Log Severity
min_level.comment: Only messages at this severity level or higher will be logged. For example, selecting "Error" will log Error, Critical, Alert, and Emergency messages, but not Warning, Notice, Info, or Debug. Note: Developer mode overrides this setting and logs all levels.

minify_enabled.label: Minify CSS Files
minify_enabled.comment: Minifies CSS files and caches them in media/mahominify for improved performance

minify_enabled.label: Minify JavaScript Files
minify_enabled.comment: Minifies JavaScript files and caches them in media/mahominify for improved performance

defer_mode.label: JavaScript Deferral Mode
defer_mode.comment:
Disabled: No deferral (default behavior)
Defer Only: Moves all script tags to the end of the page, improving initial render performance
Load on Intent: Highly Experimental! Defers all scripts until user interaction (click, scroll, hover, etc.) - designed for pure vanilla JavaScript and may not work with legacy JavaScript libraries

phone.label: Store Contact Telephone
phone.comment: If present, this will be included in all Transactional Emails

hours.label: Store Hours of Operation
hours.comment: If present, this will be included in all Transactional Emails

region.label: Region
region.comment: Optional region for providers that support it (e.g. us-east-1 for AWS)

enable_queue.label: Enable Email Queue
enable_queue.comment: When enabled, emails are queued for background sending. Automatically disabled in developer mode for immediate feedback.

image_quality.label: Image quality
image_quality.comment: Number from 0 to 100 (default is 85, recommended by Google). Higher values preserve more details but increase file size. For WebP format, you can also use 101 to enable lossless compression.

loading_timeout.label: Loading Indicator Timeout
loading_timeout.comment: Number of milliseconds to delay showing the loading indicator. The default value is "200". An empty value disables the delay.

password_reset_link_expiration_period.label: Recovery Link Expiration Period (hours)
password_reset_link_expiration_period.comment: Please enter a number 1 or greater in this field.

custom.label: Custom Admin URL
custom.comment: Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/maho/

custom_path.label: Custom Admin Path
custom_path.comment: You will have to log in after you save your custom admin path.

domain_policy_backend.label: Allow Maho Backend to run in frame
domain_policy_backend.comment: Enabling ability to run Maho in a frame is not recommended for security reasons.

domain_policy_frontend.label: Allow Maho Frontend to run in frame
domain_policy_frontend.comment: Enabling ability to run Maho in a frame is not recommended for security reasons.

hsts_enabled.label: Enable HSTS (HTTP Strict Transport Security)
hsts_enabled.comment: Forces browsers to use HTTPS. Only works on HTTPS connections.

hsts_max_age.label: HSTS Max Age (seconds)
hsts_max_age.comment: How long browsers should remember to use HTTPS. Default: 31536000 (1 year)

content_type_options_enabled.label: Enable X-Content-Type-Options
content_type_options_enabled.comment: Prevents browsers from MIME-sniffing responses. Recommended for security.

xss_protection_enabled.label: Enable X-XSS-Protection
xss_protection_enabled.comment: Enables browser XSS filtering. Note: Modern browsers prefer CSP over this header.

referrer_policy.label: Referrer Policy
referrer_policy.comment: Controls how much referrer information is sent with requests

crate_admin_user_notification.label: New Admin User Create Notification
crate_admin_user_notification.comment: This setting enable notification when new admin user created.

use_store.label: Add Store Code to Urls
use_store.comment: Warning! When using Store Code in URLs, in some cases system may not work properly if URLs without Store Codes are specified in the third party services (e.g. PayPal etc.).

redirect_to_base.label: Auto-redirect to Base URL
redirect_to_base.comment: I.e. redirect from http://example.com/store/ to http://www.example.com/store/

trailing_slash_behavior.label: Trailing Slash Behavior
trailing_slash_behavior.comment: Without this setting, a page could be accessible with both URLs: "example.com/category" and "example.com/category/". This creates duplicate content issues for SEO. Use this setting to automatically redirect to a canonical URL format.

base_js_url.label: Base JavaScript URL
base_js_url.comment: Warning! When using CDN, in some cases JavaScript may not run properly if CDN is not in your subdomain

base_url.label: Base URL
base_url.comment: Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/maho/

base_link_url.label: Base Link URL
base_link_url.comment: Make sure that base URL ends with '/' (slash), e.g. http://yourdomain/maho/

base_js_url.label: Base JavaScript URL
base_js_url.comment: Warning! When using CDN, in some cases JavaScript may not run properly if CDN is not in your subdomain

offloader_header.label: Offloader header
offloader_header.comment: Provide the name of the request header set by the upstream proxy to indicate a secure connection. The header X-Forwarded-Proto: https is already checked by default regardless of this configuration option.

use_frontend_sid.label: Use SID on Frontend
use_frontend_sid.comment: Allows customers to stay logged in when switching between different stores.
